about_the_game:
This is the Official Soundtrack for Horace, a story-driven platformer about a small robot on a big adventure!

Featuring over 75 mins of music, the Horace OST contains 42 classic chip tunes featuring classical songs composed by Beethoven, Mozart and more. All arranged by developer, Paul Helman.

1. Title: Unfinished Symphony No.8
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Franz Peter Schubert.

2. Title: The Robot's Theme
Original composition by Paul Helman.

3. Title: I'm Going To Fly
Original composition by Paul Helman.

4. Title: Danse Macabre
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Camille Saint-Saëns.

5. Title: Romance D'Amour
Arranged by Paul Helman. Traditional composition.

6. Title: Gymnopedie
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Erik Satie.

7. Title: Aquarium
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Camille Saint-Saëns.

8. Title: Everything Gone Everything Destroyed
Original composition by Paul Helman.

9. Title: Strolling In The Sky
Original composition by Paul Helman.

10. Title: Find The Keys
Original composition by Paul Helman.

11. Title: Finished Sympathy
Original composition by Paul Helman.

12. Title: Rita Hayworth Posters
Original composition by Paul Helman.

13. Title: Tank!
Original composition by Paul Helman.

14. Title: Fur Elise
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Ludwig van Beethoven.

15. Title: Clockwork Oranges And Lemons
Original composition by Paul Helman.

16. Title: Night On A Bald Mountain
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Modest Mussorgsky.

17. Title: Elton John's Guitar
Original composition by Paul Helman.

18. Title: Liberty Bell
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by John Philip Sousa.

19. Title: Snooty Psychiatrist Bros.
Original composition by Paul Helman.

20. Title: Saturn
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Gustav Holst.

21. Title: The Professor's Theme
Original composition by Paul Helman.

22. Title: Come Out And Plague
Original composition by Paul Helman.

23. Title: Lab 33
Original composition by Paul Helman.

24. Title: Requiem
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Giuseppe Verdi.

25. Title: Everyone's Home
Original composition by Paul Helman.

26. Title: House Theme
Original composition by Paul Helman.

27. Title: Rock 'n' Roll
Original composition by Paul Helman.

28. Title: Surfin' R.O.B.O.T
Original composition by Paul Helman.

29. Title: Air Waltz
Original composition by Paul Helman.

30. Title: Boom Goes The Dynamite
Original composition by Paul Helman.

31. Title: Pick A Card, Any Card
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Gustav Holst.

32. Title: Oh Captain Mike Hapden
Original composition by Paul Helman.

33. Title: New World Symphony
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Antonín Dvorák.

34. Title: The Man In Black
Original composition by Paul Helman.

35. Title: Moonlight Sonata
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Ludwig van Beethoven.

36. Title: Papageno
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

37. Title: Queen Of The Night
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

38. Title: Cathedral Of Games
Original composition by Paul Helman.

39. Title: Space Flute
Arranged by Paul Helman. Original composition by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.

40. Title: Bomb Angel
Original composition by Paul Helman.

41. Title: Atmosphere
Original composition by Paul Helman.

42. Title: Heaven
Original composition by Paul Helman.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 151 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
